name: The Turnip- Lite
description: Turnip - Russian folk tale, drawn in the best traditions of Soviet and Russian animated films, good and nice characters with whom you can safely leave your child. Every object on the screen comes to life at the behest of the gesture, and together with the heroes of fairy tales arranges the whole idea. Adults, as well as the baby will be very interesting to experience the world of fairy tales and fun. As with all our books, you will be able to directly participate in the events taking place right in your hands. We offer you all the famous fairy tale characters with mental and interesting plot, conceived down to the smallest detail. In our tale You can get acquainted with new characters, such as a crow, mole, swift, cock, and ladybug.
